meanings.definition: A person who creates and manages a budget.
meanings.sent1: The budgeter carefully tracks expenses to stay within the budget.
meanings.sent2: As a budgeter, she is responsible for ensuring the company's financial stability.
meanings.sent3: The budgeter joked that counting pennies was their favorite hobby.
meanings.sent4: She was a skilled budgeter, sculpting the company's finances like an artist.
meanings.sent5: The budgeter's attention to detail made them the go-to person for financial advice.

meanings.definition: To plan and allocate funds in a budget.
meanings.sent1: He likes to budgeter his income to save for a vacation.
meanings.sent2: She will budgeter the project funds to ensure everything is on track.
meanings.sent3: The family decided to budgeter their monthly expenses after overspending on groceries.
meanings.sent4: She had to budgeter her time wisely to complete all her tasks.
meanings.sent5: Budgetering wisely allowed him to afford the new car he wanted.
